column3: They have tennis and basketball courts plus lots of senior activities for young and old. Check out their website for these available activities

column2: Great community sports park with hiking trails.
column3: I live in Medellin Colombia but grew up in Rowland Heights, California and have hiked these hills where this community building and park now resides since I was 8 years old. This whole area was my back yard playground for the first 20 years of my life here in Rowland Heights.Am visiting Rowland Heights and my family and friends for the holidays and just this morning took a long walk from my family home to the Pathfinder Community Regional Park. The park itself has tennis and basketball courts, baseball diamonds, kids play areas, walking trails, kids play fountain and fixed exercise equipment.I just noticed today (photos uploaded) during my walk on the park trails of the new park trail signage that was recently installed as part of the regional park trail program.Very good trails in the park and lots of activity with families and sports enthusiasts . Never ever any issues with safety and the park is always very well maintained. A real contribution to the area.I recommend a visit and enjoy the park and trails.

column2: See Orange trim building? FREE parking? Hiking trails in shaded tree colonnade?
column3: See orange trim building? If yes, then go right and drive up hill curving to left. Parking is on the north and south sides and is FREE. Trees are deeply rooted which provide ample shade for vehicles and patrons. Do check out the online reservation system for current information.There was an attendant on-site to give tours of facility rooms. One room even has a kitchen included and a beautiful balcony with views to Mount Wilson. Facility was clean and bright. The community center below is another location (modern) that may be rented and has a variety of rooms and classes available.Baseball diamond may be rented and while walking I witness a ball zooming in air and bouncing on grass in right field. Picnics, baby showers and family gatherings may be scheduled here, The attendant was in house and provided answers to some basic questions. Online system is an ideal way to make reservations.
